name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Zendesk
description: This is a repository of zendesk APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Zendesk
apis.description: Customer service software and support ticketing system by Zendesk. Cloud-based help desk solution used by more than 200,000 organizations worldwide. Free 30-day trial.
